definition: to expel/to urge on/to drive/to run quickly
demonic/iniquitous/nefarious/evil/unhealthy influences that cause disease (Chinese medicine)/(coll.) strange/abnormal

sentences.english: He then becomes his assistant in exorcising ghosts and demons when he grows up.
sentences.chinese: 撫育之餘，更傳之驅邪殺鬼之術。

sentences.english: In China, the dog is considered the guardian of the house, preventing trouble and driving away evil spirits.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，狗認爲可以守家護院，驅邪鎮魔，避開麻煩。

sentences.english: Sanctity of Battle no longer reduces the cooldown of Exorcism.
sentences.chinese: 戰鬥的聖潔現在不再減少驅邪術的冷卻時間。

sentences.english: Today the exorcism is more violent and systematic.
sentences.chinese: 今天驅邪是更具暴力和更有系統的。

sentences.english: It is said that the drinkers of the chrysanthemum wine would be free from evil and have strong physique against cold weather.
sentences.chinese: 另外，飲菊花酒還有驅邪抗寒的效用。

sentences.english: Nine beads is evil, and people can turn bad luck to good luck.
sentences.chinese: 九眼天珠是驅邪的，能爲人轉厄運爲吉祥。

sentences.english: The peach have the traits of expelling evil spirits and safeguarding life.
sentences.chinese: 桃還有驅邪避鬼，護佑生命的特質。

sentences.english: Shaolin sword rich tradition of national characteristics, the role of sickness, driving away evil Yingxiang .
sentences.chinese: 少林寶劍富有傳統的民族特色，具有驅邪迎祥之作用。

sentences.english: So no, I didn't really get exorcism from it.
sentences.chinese: 如此的不，我不真的從它拿驅邪。

sentences.english: Other people say the horseshoe is made of iron, and iron has always been regarded as a protection against evil spirits.
sentences.chinese: 還有人說馬蹄鐵是鐵打的，而鐵本身就有驅邪的功能。

sentences.english: In much magic, bronze mirrors of exorcising capacity is the strongest.
sentences.chinese: 在重多法寶中，銅鏡的驅邪能力是最強的。

sentences.english: Exorcisms completed, marcus began learning believe in the existence of god.
sentences.chinese: 驅邪完成，馬卡斯開始學習相信上帝的存在。

sentences.english: Kuan Yin jadeite pendant is usually worn as an amulet to bring good fortune and as protections against harm and evil.
sentences.chinese: 人們通常掛着觀音掛墜是爲了帶來好運和驅邪避害的。

sentences.english: Specific incantations had to be uttered in exorcism.’1
sentences.chinese: 驅邪中必須唸誦特別的咒語。

definition: abundant harvest of all food crops/bumper grain harvest
an order (esp. army)/bugle call expressing military order/verbal command
General Yuchi Gong (585-658), famous military man instrumental in founding the Tang dynasty
to seek luck and avoid calamity (idiom)
ushering in wealth and prosperity (idiom and traditional greeting, esp. at New Year); We wish you wealth and success!
lit. inviting wealth/We wish you success and riches (cf idiom 招財進寶|招财进宝[zhao1 cai2 jin4 bao3])
to make life longer/to promise longevity/(this product will) extend your life
to wear (as accessories)/carry at the waist
